The only thing that the participants of the ICO will have is some symbolic object, as a sign of gratitude, but nothing that marks a difference with the rest of the players.

Author: stil55
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: Well, there a some other RPG games that rewards you with cryptocurrency. Whats so special with this one? You use tokens as ingame cash, or gamers can"mine" through gameplay? Do you already have a MVP?

Author: nelson208
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: The difference of Arker is that it does not mine while you play, this is what the other games do.  We simply give as a reward for playing our criptomoneda, already preminated.  Within the game we will have two coins, the cryptocurrency arker and the typical gold. With this we can avoid the pay2win and separate the rewards given by each of these.  This is what differentiates us from the rest, apart from this coin will be reusable in the game, or, treat it in the exchanges as a coin, so you can do what you want.  And yes, we have rewards for the best players, in addition, we will also have prizes for other modes, such as championships in 1vs1, clans, couples and many more things.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: ARKER weekly #33 / 2018  The countdown has begun. There is nothing left for the public release of Arker: The Legend of Ohm. We have worked hard to develop the latest game mechanics during these weeks after concluding the private testing period of the game. We are already working on the final touches, graphics and effects so that everything is ready for next September.    More info  https://steemit.com/arker/@arker/arker-weekly-33-2018

Author: nelson208
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: ARKER weekly #34 / 2018  The Izarian  Half-men, half-sauros; the Izarian are the best and most empirical proof of to what extent, the Arker can operate changes in a living organism. Without understanding the chemical reactions that trigger the metamorphosis, the alterations derived from the interaction with the mineral could be classified according to the "organic stratum" affected, which may occur at the superficial or tissue level, at a more internal or muscular level; or definitively, modify the structure of the subject in the deepest, at cellular level.  This is the case of the Izarian.    More info  https://steemit.com/arker/@arker/arker-weekly-34-2018

Author: nelson208
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: Today we bring you one of the most demanded features for our ICO!  We already have our referral system to give a boost to the last weeks of the ICO, with this program we will offer 5% of the proportional contribution in the ICO.    For example, if John gives his referral link to Steve, and Juan collaborates in the ICO with 1 ETH, Pedro will automatically receive the Arker ratio of 0.05 ETH at the end of the ICO.    For all those who want to have their referral link, they can contact Nelson through Telegram:    https://t.me/nelson208    Or also through the mail for inquiries from Arker    info@arker.io    Once you have your link, you only have to send it to your friends and we take care of the rest!  Any questions about the project, you can consult on our website.    https://arker.io    You can also contact us through social networks or in the official Telegram groups.    Telegram Group in Spanish: https://t.me/CommunidadArker  Telegram Group in English: https://t.me/ArkerCommunity    Thank you very much everyone for making Arker known and helping us with the propagation of this great project.    Regards!

Author: Moriarti
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: So it is going to be a cross-platform game? Also, tell me please the price for 1 coin (ARKER) in euros? And maybe you can name games in Play Market thats have similar game mechanics?

Author: nelson208
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: Hello!  Of course, the game will be cross-platform (Android, iOS, Steam and web browser)  The token does not have a definite price, the price will be determined depending on the amount collected.  Similar games, because we could say that it is a mixture of concepts among these:  - C.A.T.S, El Bruto, Hearthstone, Magic ... an RPG that collects the best of what we have considered that would have a perfect game for people and at the same time reward them with cryptocurrencies.  Regards!

Author: Moriarti
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: Nice, thank you for answer. It is not good, that i can't know how much coins i will get for my donation ( Maybe you have some predictions about price of 1 coin?

Author: nelson208
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: Hello!  I'll give you an example, let's say we get 10 btc, which is approximately 80000 USD.  In this case, if you put 800 USD in the ICO, you would receive approximately 35,000 ARKERS with a value of 0.022 USD each.  We only have 10,000,000 supply, which is why it is quite economical for the value that can be acquired in the future.

Author: Moriarti
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: As i understood, if you will get 80 000 usd, so, the price of 1 ARKER will be 80 000 / 10 000 000 = 0.008 usd So, if i put 800 usd so i will get  800 / 0.008 = 100 000 ARKERS. Isn't it?

Author: nelson208
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: Yes, but remember that 5.000.000 of Arkers stay in our server, for user payments inside the game.  But yes, your calculations are correct. Remember that at the beginning of the project, only the 3,500,000 arkers that have been distributed in the ICO will be in motion, so the value will surely be a little higher. And our expectations is to take it at a much higher price.

Author: nytyr
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: 300 ARKER COINS GIVEAWAY  To celebrate the beginning of the ICO tomorrow, November 10, Arker wants to make a giveaway. All the members of the Telegram groups (Arker Community or Comunidad Arker) can opt for an unique airdrop (free coins) of 300 Arker Coin. Therefore, until November 18th, any person who joins and stays in one or both of the Telegram groups will be given the opportunity to participate in the giveaway. When we reach the last day, through the random.org online tool, a winner will be randomly selected from among the members of both groups. Those people who are in both groups will have two entries in the giveaway!  It is also an essential requirement to follow the Twitter account ArkerCommunity. If the winner did not meet this condition, we will select another winner again until finding a winner that meets all the requirements.    The giveaway will be effective within 7 days once the ICO of the project finishes on December 30, 2017.

Author: nelson208
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: This morning our service provider (OVH) has had a problem with the power supply, leaving all the servers hosted in the European facilities without service.  We have made the migration to another provider as fast as possible, having the respective fall of the web for a few hours, hopefully it will not happen again.  We feel the inconvenience caused.  Regards!

Author: nelson208
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: Good afternoon!  Let's see, about trying the game soon, if that is possible, everyone who collaborates in the ICO will have access to a private alpha in Q1 of 2018. Those who do not invest will have to wait a little longer, but will also arrive.  About using the token in the game, of course! The tokens can be used both in the game and get them out instantly to trade with them. In the team beyond what we have been professionally, we are all very experienced programmers, and we love working with new technologies. In terms of development for mobile devices, we have worked on this, the entire team has worked in development companies for all areas.  We have done several things with videogame development, besides we have very close advisors that will help us as well. We are going to develop it ourselves, we could hire someone else, but we are very strong and very capable of doing it, and with much desire!  So we hope to see you all for the ICO and supporting us with all your strength!  Regards!

And we have our own currency on Waves (Arker Coin) which will always be able to be used in the game or trade in the Waves DEX.  Regards!

Author: nelson208
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: We searched deeply and we were not able to find anything like that. We do not know any project that consists of a game that rewards with its own cryptocurrency, and that allows to take out all your benefits to operate in the market.  It is full of games that mine existing cryptos with the potential of your device. This market is very monopolized, and it is not at all what we are looking for, so yes, it could be said that in this we are pioneers.  Regards!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: We have everything you number, but currently we do not have a demo that we can pass, we only have a small demo that we use for a Hackathon contest (in which we won with this project).  Soon we will make available a video where we will show all the qualities of the game, currently at public level we have the images of the web, several captures, characters ...  Very soon we will reveal more information.  For the rest of aspects, if you take a look at the whitepaper, you will see that it is a game with a theme and a story quite successful and with many things to expand.  Greetings and many thanks!

Author: nelson208
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: Hello!  When I say devices, I mean all of them, telephones, computers, tablets and others. Our idea is release the game on platforms like Steam, iOS, Android and Browser.  Our coin (Arker Coin) is already preminated, our objetive is distribute this currency to the people who play, but nothing to mine. It is not what we want.  Regards!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: Good afternoon!  The truth is that the demo we have is something that was used for a contest, and that has nothing to do with the graphics and scenarios we have now, we focus more on the technical part, so we would only generate doubts hahaha.  The nearest official version will be the one provided to the investors in the ICO.  Regards!

Author: filippounits
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: Juanjo Chust        Founder / CEO After almost 5 years directing a small development team in a company specialized in online payment methods, he decided to specialize in blockchain technology.    Aaron Martínez        Operations After almost 5 years directing a development team in a company specialized in online payment methods, he has specialized in blockchain technology.    Nelson Marco        Social / Systems He has been managing servers that accomplished the strictest security standards such as PCI-DSS and always had passion for online marketing (SEO, Social Networks ...).    Jose Ignacio Rubio    Technologies With more than 5 years of experience, he is currently in the R&D sector using the most advanced technologies in the world of software.    Carlos Santamaria    Design Architect / Creator of worlds Copywriter and expert in gamification and advergaming, he has worked for companies such as Pixar and collaborated on various projects in the field of design, mobile applications, video games and e-commerce.        Follow us on the social networks

Author: nytyr
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: It's a turn-based strategy game, the coin is pre-mined, when you win, the game rewards you with an amount of Arker coins.  You can use this coin to buy chests, which contain random objects and abilities, or use it in the exchange. You are in control of your wallet.  You can check the whitepaper for a full detailed description!  Quote from: PAKOBuHA on October 30, 2017, 11:12:53 PM You use tokens as ingame cash, or gamers can "mine" through gameplay?  Do you already have a MVP?  Thanx  The coin is used as in-game cash. It's pre-mined.

Author: nytyr
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: No. The coin is not re-issuable.  When a player buys a chest, these tokens return to the game to be able to be distributed again.

Author: nelson208
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: All the games that usually make this type of system, what they do is use the power of your device to mine an existing currency to give you then a small portion.  In this case, the system is different, and I have not seen any that offers you a coin at the expense of playing.

Author: nelson208
Title: [ANN] [ICO] ARKER: The Online RPG that rewards you with cryptocurrency
Body: The ICO will start in 9 days, on November 10 a new section will open, where you can collaborate with the project with Bitcoin, Ethereum, Waves and FIAT money (we will implement a payment gateway with card).  It will last 50 days, the first days will have a bonus. We do not have a defined price for the token, the price will be defined according to the people who invest.  We are convinced that it will be a very promising project, since we are very involved in all aspects of the game and have a lot of advice from people. They tell us what they want to have in a game of this type.  On the other hand, we are different from other projects like this, since most of them what they do is mine with your device and give you a small portion of the generated reward, which seems to us an abuse of hardware, apart from other things ( use of the battery, higher consumption, low performance of the device ...).  We want to motivate the player by rewarding their time, They feel that they are doing something productive while being entertained, without their device being at 100%.  Therefore the player can get Arker Coins just by playing, and these can be exchanged again in the game by special objects or take them out and operate with them in the crypto marker, the player will be the absolute owner of their wallet.
